接口的使用
reactor.core.publisher.Sinks.EmitFailureHandler

  • 使用Sinks.EmitFailureHandler的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    reactor.core.publisher
    Provide main Reactive APIs in Flux and Mono, as well as various helper classes, interfaces used in the composition API, variants of Flux and operator-building utilities.

    • reactor.core.publisher中Sinks.EmitFailureHandler的使用

      声明为Sinks.EmitFailureHandler的reactor.core.publisher中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static Sinks.EmitFailureHandler Sinks.EmitFailureHandler.FAIL_FAST
      A pre-made handler that will not instruct to retry any failure and trigger the failure handling immediately.
      返回Sinks.EmitFailureHandler的reactor.core.publisher中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static Sinks.EmitFailureHandler Sinks.EmitFailureHandler.busyLooping(java.time.Duration duration)
      Create an Sinks.EmitFailureHandler which will busy loop in case of concurrent use of the sink (Sinks.EmitResult.FAIL_NON_SERIALIZED, up to a deadline.
      参数类型为Sinks.EmitFailureHandler的reactor.core.publisher中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Sinks.Many.emitComplete(Sinks.EmitFailureHandler failureHandler)
      A simplified attempt at completing via the Sinks.Many.tryEmitComplete() API, generating an onComplete signal.
      void Sinks.Empty.emitEmpty(Sinks.EmitFailureHandler failureHandler)
      A simplified attempt at completing via the Sinks.Empty.tryEmitEmpty() API, generating an onComplete signal.
      void Sinks.Many.emitError(java.lang.Throwable error, Sinks.EmitFailureHandler failureHandler)
      A simplified attempt at failing the sequence via the Sinks.Many.tryEmitError(Throwable) API, generating an onError signal.
      void Sinks.Empty.emitError(java.lang.Throwable error, Sinks.EmitFailureHandler failureHandler)
      A simplified attempt at failing the sequence via the Sinks.Empty.tryEmitError(Throwable) API, generating an onError signal.
      void UnicastProcessor.emitNext(T value, Sinks.EmitFailureHandler failureHandler)
      已过时。 
       
      void Sinks.Many.emitNext(T t, Sinks.EmitFailureHandler failureHandler)
      A simplified attempt at emitting a non-null element via the Sinks.Many.tryEmitNext(Object) API, generating an onNext signal.
      void Sinks.One.emitValue(T value, Sinks.EmitFailureHandler failureHandler)
      A simplified attempt at emitting a non-null element via the Sinks.One.tryEmitValue(Object) API, generating an onNext signal immediately followed by an Subscriber.onComplete() signal.
